name: LM Brick Breaker
description:
Features
  • Win32 and win64
  • 11 levels, others in progress
  •  Windowed or fullscreen
  • 1 player (at this moment)
  • game control : keyboard
  • mouse : only for the main menu
  • music can be stopped by pressing a special keypad
Command

h -  display help

a combobox to choose the level of difficulty (number of lives)
